abstract.p: Correction of October 15 article on design trends and work of graphic designers Bruce Mau and Zone Books, which misspelled names of Michel Feher, Erwin Panofsky, Georges Bataille and Chee Pearlman and omitted names of Zone editors Hal Foster and Ramona Naddaff (S)

block.p: An article on Oct. 15 about trends in design and the work of the graphics designer Bruce Mau with Zone Books misspelled the surname of one of the imprint's editors. He is Michel Feher, nor Fehrer. The article omitted the names of two other prominent editors at Zone who have worked with Mr. Mau; they are Hal Foster and Ramona Naddaff. The article also misspelled the surnames of two authors published by Zone. They are the art historian Erwin Panofsky, not Panovsky, and the philosopher Georges Bataille, not Batailles. And the article misspelled the surname of a former editor of I.D., a leading magazine in the field. She is Chee Pearlman, not Perlman.
